ARABIC: لَا تَجْـَٔرُوا۟ ٱلْيَوْمَ إِنَّكُم مِّنَّا لَا تُنصَرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Do not pray fervently today. You will not get any help from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do not supplicate for help today; you will not be rescued by Us;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Put a stop to your groaning now! Surely no help shall be provided to you from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall tell them, "Do not cry for help on this day; you will receive none from Us".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Do not implore this day; you will not be helped by Us.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Invoke not loudly this day! Certainly you shall not be helped by Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Cry not for succor this day; surely you shall not be given help from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Groan not today; surely you shall not be helped from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Supplicate not this day! Assuredly ye will not be helped by Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do not cry out for help this day, for surely you shall not be helped by Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Implore not to-day; verily ye from Us are not to be succoured.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Do not make entreaties today! Indeed, you will not receive any help from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (It will be said): "Groan not in supplication this day: for ye shall certainly not be helped by Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Invoke not loudly this day! Certainly, you shall not be helped by Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (We shall say): 'Do not groan today, surely you shall receive no help from Us'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do not groan today. You will receive no help from Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do not cry out today. Indeed, by Us you will not be helped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:65] ‘Do not supplicate [out loud] on this day! Truly you will not receive help, you will not be protected, against Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Say to them, Muhammad: (Supplicate not this day) to escape Our punishment! (Assuredly you will not be helped) you will not be saved (by Us) from Our punishment.
